text: Ara tini tamra pitamatake uccasane basalena, ara tamra karane tamra sijadarata halena. Takhana tini balalena, ''he amara abba! Eti'i amara purbekara daibadarsanera tatparya, amara prabhu ta satye parinata karechena. Ara tini amara prati anugraha karechilena yakhana tini amake karagara theke mukta karechilena, ebam marubhumi theke apanadera niye esechena amara madhye o amara bha'iyera madhye sayatana birodha badhabara pare. Nihsandeha amara prabhu yake iccha karena tara prati parama sadasaya. Nihsandeha tini nije'i sarbajnata, paramajnani.
